titleStmt.title: A short instruction for to arme all good Christian people agaynst the pestiferous errours of the common secte of Anabaptistes. Compiled by mayster Iohn Caluine
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Daye, dwellinge at Aldersgate, and William Seres, dwellinge in Peter Colledge These bokes are too be sold at the new shop by the litle conduite in Chepeside,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Running title reads: Agaynst the articles of the Anabaptistes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
